top_comments.comment: That intro song never gets old
Do the hermits just not like normal biomes so they decide to make their own. First cub now ren, plus ren made mustafar and tatooine last season lol

comments_since_last_sample.body: That intro song never gets old

Or perhaps the barrels are hidden by item frames making it difficult to differentiate the barrel behind them from any other standard block. The only visible/noticeable barrel in the Octagon is the one above the discount bin. Make the barrels more visible or do some hands on education lol
